trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that controls the rerun of the job preparation task after a reboot of a TVM which had a previously successful run the job preparation task.
trans-unit.target: Gets or sets the value that controls the rerun of the job preparation task after a reboot of a TVM which had a previously successful run the job preparation task.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, a default value of true is assigned by the Batch Service.
trans-unit.target: If this property is not specified, a default value of true is assigned by the Batch Service.

trans-unit.source: Note that the job preparation task should still be written to be idempotent because it can be retun if the TVM is rebooted while Job Prep Task is still running.
trans-unit.target: Note that the job preparation task should still be written to be idempotent because it can be retun if the TVM is rebooted while Job Prep Task is still running.
